India is one of the most ideal destinations for foreign investors looking to set-up their businesses. However, before starting business operations in India, it is important for the investor to understand the laws that will apply to the business. This is where our team excels in providing strategic advisory to guide an investor for a hassle-free entry into India. Our team advises corporates and individual investors on variety of matters across this sector ranging from:

  - Guidance on entry strategy into India;
  - Assist in choosing the right set up for the clientâ€™s business keeping in mind future goals.
  - Assist in initial setup of company;
  - Company Secretarial assistance;
  - Labour and Employee Related Advisory;
  - Boardroom Strategy based on Investor specific needs;
  - Drafting of all relevant contractual documents required by the company to undertake  business with third parties.
  - Brand protection strategy; 
  - Assist in drafting initial documentation on governance framework and internal policies.
  - Providing end to end legal services
